definitions.definition: An act of adultery committed by a married woman against her husband.
The state of being a cuckold .
Among certain male fish , the practice of interrupting a mating pair to release sperm in an attempt to fertilize the female .

main_definition: An act of adultery committed by a married woman against her husband.
secondary_definitions: The state of being a cuckold .
( zoology ) Among certain male fish , the practice of interrupting a mating pair to release sperm in an attempt to fertilize the female .
